医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
UT Health San Antonio 领导开发针对衣原体的口服疫苗美国国立卫生研究院通过一项合作协议研究项目拨款（称为 U01 拨款），在五年内为一项可预防衣原体感染的新型口服疫苗的研究提供了约 1100 万美元的资助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/UT-Health-San-Antonio-leads-effort-for-developing-oral-vaccine-against-chlamydia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/UT-Health-San-Antonio-leads-effort-for-developing-oral-vaccine-against-chlamydia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f76a1cf-8243-49c4-a8e1-f769f02169cc Thu, 09 May 2024 14:16:03 -0400 UT Health San Antonio leads effort for developing oral vaccine against chlamydia
南加州大学护理学院成立，旨在促进护士的教育、领导力和卓越表现南加州大学凯克医学院成立了南加州大学护理学院，以促进护士的教育、领导力发展、临床专业知识和研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/USC-Nursing-Institute-launched-to-promote-education-leadership-and-excellence-among-nurses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/USC-Nursing-Institute-launched-to-promote-education-leadership-and-excellence-among-nurses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=34cfa25b-e432-421a-9122-df2599b8bf87 Thu, 09 May 2024 14:08:46 -0400 USC Nursing Institute launched to promote education, leadership and excellence among nurses
住院医生越来越多地避开有堕胎限制的州伊莎贝拉·罗萨里奥·布鲁姆 (Isabella Rosario Blum) 即将完成医学院学业，并考虑参加住院医师培训计划，成为一名家庭医生，这时她得到了一些坦率的建议：如果她想接受提供堕胎服务的培训，她就不应该留在亚利桑那州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Medical-residents-are-increasingly-avoiding-states-with-abortion-restrictions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Medical-residents-are-increasingly-avoiding-states-with-abortion-restrictions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f982eb94-34cf-49c2-972e-e5d55fe918bf Thu, 09 May 2024 14:02:43 -0400 Medical residents are increasingly avoiding states with abortion restrictions
英国女性健康状况停滞不前，而其他国家却在进步最新数据强调了健康差距和改善妇女健康的必要性，特别是在预防、情感和怀孕护理方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Womene28099s-health-in-the-UK-stagnates-while-other-countries-progress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Womene28099s-health-in-the-UK-stagnates-while-other-countries-progress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0920bd0-1727-4c28-ba46-c892afb06033 Thu, 09 May 2024 09:38:00 -0400 Women’s health in the UK stagnates while other countries progress

可以为想要改善乳汁供应和增加健康的哺乳期父母提供放松干预措施《美国医学会儿科杂志》最近的一项研究探讨了放松疗法在增加人类母亲产奶量方面的效用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase-幸福感.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Relaxation-interventions-can-be-offered-to-lactating-parents-who-would-like-to-improve-milk-supply-and-increase- well-being.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=830e6c0d-d153-4a7b-ada7-9d4b251cd142 Thu, 09 May 2024 07:46:00 -0400 Relaxation interventions can be offered to lactating parents who would like to improve milk supply and increase well-being
新研究显示，童年时期久坐时间的增加会导致心脏不断扩大最近的一项研究调查了儿童期和成年早期的久坐时间（ST）、低强度体力活动（LPA）和中强度体力活动（MVPA）是否影响心脏结构和功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Increase-in-sedentary-time-from-childhood-causes-progressing-heart-enlargement-new-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Increase-in-sedentary-time-from-childhood-causes-progressing-heart-enlargement-new-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3b872b3f-448b-4797-81b9-5182706fd84a Thu, 09 May 2024 07:07:00 -0400 Increase in sedentary time from childhood causes progressing heart enlargement, new study shows
研究表明，妊娠期空气污染暴露会改变胎盘 DNA 甲基化模式产前空气污染物暴露浓度与胎盘脱氧核糖核酸（DNA）甲基化变化之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Placental-DNA-methylation-patterns-altered-by-pregnancy-air-pollution-exposure-research-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Placental-DNA-methylation-patterns-altered-by-pregnancy-air-pollution-exposure-research-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e80019d5-8d41-4c61-8eea-5d2e5473b868 Thu, 09 May 2024 07:02:00 -0400 Placental DNA methylation patterns altered by pregnancy air pollution exposure, research reveals
许多大流行保护措施消失后，带薪病假仍然存在比尔·汤普森的妻子从未见过他自信地微笑。在他们交往的头 20 年里，他的口腔感染导致他的牙齿一颗颗脱落。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Paid-sick-leave-sticks-after-many-pandemic-protections-vanish.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240509/Paid-sick-leave-sticks-after-many-pandemic-protections-vanish.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c66334d7-d702-40ba-8366-f171e465dd49 Thu, 09 May 2024 06:45:36 -0400 Paid sick leave sticks after many pandemic protections vanish
